turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, I was thinking about ordering some pizza to pick up.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i can help order the pizza for you. where do you want to order from?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: oh i know the place. perfect. and what did you want to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm going to have three small pizzas.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And one of them a thick-crust Veggie Lovers, one of them a thick-crust chicken barbecue, and one of them a thick-crust cheese and spinach.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so, you want 3 small pizzas, 1 thick crust veggie lovers, 1 thick crust chicken bbq, and 1 thick crust cheese and spinach pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: $36.99 is the total. should i place the order now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, i've placed the pizza order for you at bella luna's. the pizzas should be ready for pick up in 35 mins.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Awesome. No. Thank you so much, though. You, too. Thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you need my help with anything else?
